original_text: Jesus went into the yard of the temple. Some people were selling things there. He began to make them all leave that place.

sentences.original_text: Jesus went into the yard of the temple
Some people were selling things there
sentences.korean_translation: 거기서 어떤 사람들이 물건을 팔고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: He began to make them all leave that place
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들 모두에게 그곳을 떠나도록 하기 시작했습니다
